allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Expense Tracker - Full-stack Personal Finance App

Features:
- FastAPI backend with RESTful API
- JWT authentication system
- PostgreSQL database with SQLAlchemy ORM
- Pydantic models for data validation
- CRUD operations for expenses, income, categories, and budgets
- Pagination for transaction lists
- Redis caching for analytics and dashboard
- Financial analytics with spending trends
- React frontend with modern UI
- Interactive charts using Recharts
- Docker containerization with docker-compose
- Comprehensive API documentation

Tech Stack:
- Backend: FastAPI, PostgreSQL, SQLAlchemy, Redis, JWT
- Frontend: React, React Router, Axios, Recharts, Vite
- DevOps: Docker, Docker Compose, Nginx

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
